title: Original woodblock from Commentarii in Sex Libros Pedacii
description: Flower-like clusters of small balloons and \"hair-like\" leaves. In Arens Collection copy, this figure appears in Lib. quartum Discoridis, p.1044, with title Helichrysm above the figure
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
